chapters.title: Chapter 17:  Partings, and a Meeting
chapters.info: Careane Fransi, p. 254—Late Aes Sedai of the Green Ajah. She had shoulders and arms as big as most men. She grew up in Arad Doman, and had worn the shawl for over fifty years now. She was among the sisters that are now sworn to obey Rand. Either she or Sareitha had to have been the murderess of Adeleas, and thus Black Ajah; all other suspects had been eliminated. Careane was revealed to have been guilty of Adeleas's murder and those of several of the Kin shortly before Vandene plunged her dagger through Careane's heart.
